Title: HIGH BRIDGE HIP MARCH
Directions: This exercise is used to strengthen the hip flexors in one leg while strengthen the hip extensors in the other leg and can be used as part of a running strength program. Bridge your body up with your hands on an elevated surface like a bench or edge of a sofa. Loop a miniband around both feet and extend both hips to neutral. Raise one knee to 90 degrees hip flexion and hold for up to 5 seconds and alternate sides.
